name: Class SimpleDocTreeVisitor<R,​P>
text: A simple visitor for tree nodes.
codes:
public class SimpleDocTreeVisitor<R, P>
extends Object
implements DocTreeVisitor<R, P>

fields.description: The default value, returned by the default action.

methods.method_sig:
protected R defaultAction (DocTree node,
                          P p)
methods.description: The default action, used by all visit methods that are not overridden.

methods.method_sig:
public final R visit (DocTree node,
                     P p)
methods.description: Invokes the appropriate visit method specific to the type of the node.

methods.method_sig:
public final R visit (Iterable<? extends DocTree> nodes,
                     P p)
methods.description: Invokes the appropriate visit method on each of a sequence of nodes.

methods.method_sig:
public R visitAttribute (AttributeTree node,
                        P p)
methods.description: Visits an AttributeTree node. This implementation calls defaultAction.

methods.method_sig:
public R visitAuthor (AuthorTree node,
                     P p)
methods.description: Visits an AuthorTree node. This implementation calls defaultAction.

methods.method_sig:
public R visitComment (CommentTree node,
                      P p)
methods.description: Visits a CommentTree node. This implementation calls defaultAction.

methods.method_sig:

                         P p)
methods.description: Visits a DeprecatedTree node. This implementation calls defaultAction.

methods.description: Visits a DocCommentTree node. This implementation calls defaultAction.

methods.method_sig:
public R visitOther (DocTree node,
                    P p)
methods.description:
Visits an unknown type of DocTree node.
 This can occur if the set of tags evolves and new kinds
 of nodes are added to the DocTree hierarchy. This implementation calls defaultAction.
